title: The Circle recap: The finalists are confirmed as Ella gets blocked
text:
The final five have secured their place in the last days (Picture: Channel 4)

It’s finale day guys! The Circle is closing for another year and it looks like it’s going to be one hell of a final outing.

On Thursday’s penultimate episode, Ella was given her marching orders by demands the The Circle of Trust – aka Sammie/James, who seems to be getting a little drunk with the power of it all.

Missing out on influencer status, poor Georgina had to face off against Tim to do the ‘Revolution’s’ bidding, and was heartbroken as she came to realise that she had to do the dirty on Ella.

James has been playing the gang like a fiddle under the guise of single mum Sammie (Picture: Channel 4)

Thankfully, Ella was still trying to keep it chill and positive to the end, and as Georgina had to block her face-to-face, the pair had a cuddle and a girly chat.

Advertisement

Advertisement

As a parting gift, Ella told her: ‘Tim and Woody are just pure kindness I think. I don’t know if they are who they say they are, but my God have they got a lot of love.’

The couple then bonded over speaking from ‘different hymn sheets, but same message’ about body positivity, with Ella backing Georgina to win.

When the news breaks, the Circle of Trust are ecstatic, but Tim the all-knowing was left fuming, and Woody gutted at the early exit of his best friend in the game.

Ella kept her 'pozzy vibes' right until the very end! What a girl. Rainbow heart. Send. #TheCircle pic.twitter.com/KF24tAo5n2 — The Circle (@C4TheCircle) October 17, 2019

But with 24 hours until the final, it’s only a matter of time before he meets his bestie IRL.

It wasn’t all sadness and scheming though on The Circle, as everyone received a message from home.

Zoe Ball and Norman Cook – aka Fatboy Slim – emerged from a cupboard to cheer on son Woody, and there were tears a plenty as mums, dads and partners shared their pride in their loved one’s efforts on the show.

Georgina felt guilty after eliminating Ella (Picture: Channel 4)

Everyone needed a little pick me up from that, and it seems the revelations were everything they needed in their last full day in the show.

But the £100k is now firmly in sight, and it’s down to the viewers and one last ratings to see who gets the cash.

Advertisement

Advertisement

More: The Circle Zoe Ball and ex-husband Fatboy Slim reunite to support son Woody on The Circle The Circle recap: Sammie and Tim clash as Jan becomes victim of 'The Revolution' The Circle is the best thing to happen to reality TV since Big Brother

And then of course there’s that awkward dinner they’re all going to have together where their true selves are revealed.

How’s everyone going to feel when they realise they’ve been duped into scamming by a catfish?

The Circle ends tonight at 10pm on Channel 4.

Got a showbiz story? If you've got a story, video or pictures get in touch with the Metro.co.uk Entertainment team by emailing us celebtips@metro.co.uk, calling 020 3615 2145 or by visiting our Submit Stuff page - we'd love to hear from you.

description: Georgina has a lot to think about as 'The Revolution' blocks Ella just before The Circle finale.
